title: News product teams are uniquely positioned to unlock AI value
description: There are many reasons I found the first in-person News Product Alliance Summit this past October to be enlightening and enjoyable — the meticulously organized programming, the brilliant cadre of speakers, beautiful autumn days in Chicago and a chance to reconnect with many of the friends and colleagues who have long paved the way in...
